title: Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit | 25 Guided STEM Experiment Lessons | 48 Page Color Student Guide | Grades 3-6 | Ages 8+ | Play & Learn | Parents' Choice Silver Award Winner
descriptions:
**Unlock the Secrets of Electricity and Magnetism with the Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit**

Discover the fascinating world of physics and engineering with our award-winning science kit, perfect for young learners aged 8 and above. The Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit is a comprehensive, hands-on learning experience that combines fun and education, making it an ideal gift for curious kids.

**25 Guided STEM Experiment Lessons**

Embark on an exciting journey of exploration with 25 guided experiment lessons, carefully designed to help your child grasp the fundamental principles of electricity, magnetism, and energy conversion. From building simple circuits to learning about gears and drive-trains, our kit provides a comprehensive introduction to the world of physics and engineering.

**48-Page Color Student Guide**

Our beautifully illustrated, 48-page color student guide is packed with easy-to-follow instructions, diagrams, and illustrations to help your child understand complex concepts. With its engaging content and colorful visuals, learning has never been more fun and accessible.

**Awards and Recognition**

We're proud to say that our Motors & Generators Science Kit has earned the prestigious Parents' Choice Silver Award, a testament to its quality, educational value, and fun learning experience.

**Key Features:**

- Electric motor with transparent plastic for a unique, hands-on learning experience
- Battery-powered motor operation and reconfigurable to hand-crank electric generator
- Explore magnetic fields and electric current in a fun and interactive way
- Build simple circuits and learn about gears and drive-trains
- Develop essential STEM skills and knowledge

**Perfect for:**

- Kids aged 8 and above
- Grades 3-6
- Homeschooling and classroom learning
- Gift-giving for birthdays, holidays, or special occasions

**Order now and spark your child's curiosity and creativity!**

Dimensions: 13.1 x 8.9 x 2.6 inches, 1.3 pounds.
